div.ab:
دينر قبضت من ذلك
مبلغ كرى دار الخربة دينرين وثلثي دينر وقيراط وثلث قبضت من ذلك نصف وربع دينر و
مبلغ كرى دار أم مكّي ثلثة دنانير ونصف وقراط قبضت من ذلك دينر ونصف دينر و
مبلــغ كــرى معمر مخروب معيوب دينرين وثلثي دينر قبضت من ذلك
مبلغ كرى دار رفّا وطرّف دينرين قبضت من ذلك دينر
مبلــغ كرى حوانيت المغازلي دينرين وسدس دينر قبضت من ذلك نصف وثمن دينر
مبلــغ كرى دار السّمنّودي ثلثة دنانير وثــلث وقيراطين قبضت من ذلك نصف وثلث دينر

*** dīnār:un qabaḍtu min ḏālika ***
mablaġu kirà dāri ăl ḫirbaẗi dīnārayni wa ṯulṯay dīnār:in wa qīrāṭ:un wa ṯulṯ:un qabaḍtu min ḏālika niṣfa wa rubʿa dīnār:in wa ***
mablaġu kirà dāri ʾummi makkiyy:in ṯalāṯaẗu danānīra wa niṣf:un wa qirāṭ:un qabaḍtu min ḏālika dīnār wa niṣfa dīnār:in wa ***
mablaġu kirà maʿmari maʿmar:in maḫrūb:in maʿyūb:in dīnārayni wa ṯulṯay dīnār:in qabaḍtu min ḏālika ***
mablaġu kirà dāri raffāʾ:in wa ṭarrāf:in dīnārayni qabaḍtu min ḏālika dīnār
mablaġu kirà ḥawānīti ăl maġāziliyyi dīnārayni wa sudsu dīnār:in qabaḍtu min ḏālika niṣfa wa ṯumna dīnār:in ***
mablaġu kirà dāri ăs samannūdiyyi ṯalāṯaẗu danānīra wa ṯulṯ:un wa qīrāṭayni qabaḍtu min ḏālika niṣfa wa ṯulṯa dīnār:in

[ ...]dīnār. I have received of that[ ] [ ...]dīnār. Of that I have received [ ]
The amount of rent from the house of the ruin - two dīnārs, two thirds of a dīnār, a qīrāṭ and a third. Of that I have received a half and a quarter of a dīnār and [ ] The amount of the rent of the house of the ruin - two dīnārs, two thirds of a dīnār, a qīrāṭ and a third. I have received of that a half and a quarter of a dīnār and [ ]
The amount of rent from the house of Umm Makki - three dīnārs and a half and a qīrāṭ. Of that I have received one dīnār and a half dīnār and [ ] The amount of the rent of the house of ʾUmm Makkī - three dīnārs and a half and a qīrāṭ. I have received of that one dīnār and a half dīnār and [ ]
The amount of rent from a ruined dwelling - two dīnārs and two thirds of a dīnār. Of that I have received... [The amount] of the rent of a ruined dwelling - two dīnārs and two thirds of a dīnār. I have received [of that...] [The amount] of the rent of the dwelling(?) of Maʿyūb
The amount of rent from the house of a darner and a cobbler - two dīnārs. Of that I have received one dīnār. The amount of the rent of the house of a darner and a cobbler - two dīnārs. I have received of that one dīnār.
The amount of rent from the shops of the spindle-maker - two dīnār and a sixth of a dīnār. Of that I have received a half and an eighth of a dīnār [ ] [The amount] of the rent of the shops of the spindle-maker - two dīnār and a sixth of a dīnār. I have received of that a half and an eighth of a dīnār [ ]
The amount of rent from the house of al-Samannudi - three [dīnārs and] a third and two qīrāṭs. Of that I have received a half and a third [dīnār]. [The amount] of the rent of the house of al-Samannūdī - three [dīnārs and] a third and two qīrāṭs. I have received of that a half and a third [dīnār].
